sense.gloss: having an immediate effect, taking immediate effect
the certainty of divine punishment, Swift is Heaven's vengeance
immediate (effect, result, etc.), instant, instantaneous, prompt

sdata.j: この↑辺↑↓へん↓の↑意地悪↑↓いじわる↓↑婆↑↓ばあ↓さんが↑雷↑↓かみなり↓に↑打↑↓う↓たれて↑頓死↑↓とんし↓したらしい。まさに↑天罰覿面↑↓てんばつてきめん↓だとうちの↑母↑↓かあ↓さんが↑言↑↓い↓う。
sdata.e: It seems the mean old woman that lived around here was struck by lightning and suddenly died. My mother says it's truly a case of the swiftness of Heaven's vengeance.

words.gloss: having an immediate effect, taking immediate effect
the certainty of divine punishment, Swift is Heaven's vengeance
immediate (effect, result, etc.), instant, instantaneous, prompt
